header.title: base64

erlref.modulesummary: Implements base 64 encode and decode, see RFC2045.

description.p: Implements base 64 encode and decode, see RFC2045.

desc.p: A binary() with ASCII characters in the range 1 to 255.
Encodes a plain ASCII string into base64. The result will be 33% larger than the data.

func.fsummary: Decodes a base64 encoded string to data.

desc.p: Decodes a base64 encoded string to plain ASCII. See RFC4648. mime_decode/1 and mime_decode_to_string/1 strips away illegal characters, while decode/1 and decode_to_string/1 only strips away whitespace characters.
